title: Only One Road
description: Past always comes back to bite you in the butt, doesn't it? Especially if you never actually let it go and if you still long for it. Do you welcome it back or do you try to run away? Connor Blake thought that he has finally freed himself from the painful shadows of memories and emotions that were haunting him for the last eight years; until one night when he opens his front door just to face the blast from the past that materialized on his front steps.
author: Katya Dee
